summary: I'VE HAD TWO SEPARATE CPS FAILURES ON MY 2000 FORD SUPER DUTY WITH THE 7.3 DIESEL.  BOTH TIMES IT MANIFESTED ITSELF AS THE MOTOR DYING WITHOUT WARNING.  ONCE IT WAS ON THE HIGHWAY.  THERE WHERE NO INJURIES WITH EITHER INCIDENT BUT THAT COULD HAVE EASILY BEEN A DIFFERENT STORY HAD I BEEN PULLING MY TRAILER. BOTH TIMES REPLACING THE (OVER PRICED) CPS WAS THE SOLUTION.  THE OLD PARTS WERE DISCARDED.*JB
